MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the FK1 postcode area of Slamannan. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:19pm. Our emergency response team have inspected the Binniehill Road substation and have now established an underground cable fault. Repairs are taking longer than expected due to the complexity of the work required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:20pm on Saturday, 20 February 2021.
